title: When The Male Supporting Actor Bend The Male Lead - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   School Life   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Ancient Times   Animal Characteristics   Apocalypse   Appearance Changes   Charming Protagonist   Confinement   Cunning Protagonist   Early Romance   Fantasy Creatures   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Possessive Characters   Shameless Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 清水娘娘
description:
Quickly adapt into various kind of character shou vs various kinds of handsome gong.

In the romance story, the female lead has at least three spare tires. Before the female lead and the male lead became lovers, the supporting male character is used for infatuation. However, at the end of the story, the  most injured one is the supporting male character. 

Qi Yan is the lucky boy selected by the system.

[Host, your task is to bend the male lead and cast aside the female lead.]
“….What hatred do you have for the female lead?”>
